body:
**Short version:** 
How do I pass the option INCDIR = -I/usr/include/malloc/ -I../../MGridGen/IMlib/ to
spack install parmgridgen ?  

**Long version:** 
I am trying to install OpenFOAM on MACOS Sierra 10.12.6 and Xcode9.2 using spack. To give more information on the failure, I first tried to separetely install all packages on which OpenFOAM builds. All packages install well, except for parmgridgen. 

I therefore downloaded parmgridgen from the URL http://www-users.cs.umn.edu/~moulitsa/software . I learned that the installation will go well provided the include paths are properly set as above. I am now trying to repeat this exercise using spack.
title: Install of parmgridgen (aux OpenFOAM) fails on MACOS Sierra due incomplete include
